segments.text: Hi , Li Ming . You look upset . What's the matter ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There will be a parents ' meeting in our class this Saturday and I am worried about it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why ? We can leave school earlier that day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I didn't do well in last exams . If my father knows it , he will beat me up .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can't believe it . My parents never beat me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know that my father is irritable .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can ask the teacher for help .
segments.speaker: S1
